Commotion 1.0

Our groundbreaking mesh networking toolkit, is now available.
Download | Get Started | Learn More

Commotion is an open-source communication tool that uses mobile phones, computers, and other wireless devices to create decentralized mesh networks.

Interested in trying Commotion or learning more? Our Get Started guide will explain how.

Are you interested in contributing to Commotion? Get Involved!

Have Questions about Commotion? Our Frequently Asked Questionsi covers many of them
